timeline.message:
Keep internal reference for access and egress legs

This allows us to map the correct accessa nd egress leg to the itinerary, when a stop has multiple possible accesses or egresses.

Extract setInitialTimeForIteration into RoutingStrategy

In order to separate the behaviour for NO_WAIT serches, which should not include time shifted acces or egress states.
Also rename TransitRoutingStrategy into RoutingStrategy, as the implementation now also covers how the access should be linked to the trasit part of the search.
